original_prompt: Create an ad of a bottle of luxury Dior perfume positioned against a backdrop of  Paris.
final_prompt: A luxurious Dior perfume bottle elegantly positioned on a glossy black surface, with the Eiffel Tower softly blurred in the background at twilight, captured in a close-up portrait using a Canon EOS R5 with an 85mm f/1.2 lens, illuminated by soft, diffused lighting that highlights the sleek contours of the bottle, featuring a cinematic color grading with warm, golden hues to evoke an upscale and romantic atmosphere, in a 16:9 aspect ratio.
negative_prompt: blurry, low quality, distorted, deformed, watermark, text, signature, extra limbs, mutated hands, poorly drawn, bad proportions, cloned face, disfigured, oversaturated, unrealistic reflections, incorrect lighting, floating objects, missing shadows, harsh shadows, incorrect perspective, noise, grain, pixelated, smeared textures, incomplete rendering

iterations.enhanced_prompt: A luxurious Dior perfume bottle elegantly positioned on a glossy black surface, with the Eiffel Tower softly blurred in the background at twilight, captured in a close-up portrait using a Canon EOS R5 with an 85mm f/1.2 lens, illuminated by soft, diffused lighting that highlights the sleek contours of the bottle, featuring a cinematic color grading with warm, golden hues to evoke an upscale and romantic atmosphere, in a 16:9 aspect ratio.
iterations.critique: The prompt is highly detailed, effectively combining elements of the product (Dior perfume bottle), setting (Eiffel Tower, twilight), and specific photographic techniques (close-up portrait, Canon EOS R5 with an 85mm f/1.2 lens). The description of lighting and color grading enhances the visual appeal and aligns well with the luxury and romance associated with the brand. However, the prompt might be slightly over-constrained with the specific mention of camera model and lens, which may not be necessary for the image generation model and could limit the creative interpretation. Additionally, the inclusion of technical specifications like '16:9 aspect ratio' might not be interpreted effectively by all image generation models.
improvements: Remove the specific camera model and lens details to allow more creative flexibility in how the image is rendered.
Consider simplifying the aspect ratio detail unless it is crucial for the intended use of the image, as some models might not interpret this effectively.
Enhance natural language flow by reducing the technical jargon slightly, making it more accessible and potentially more effective for a broader range of image generation models.
